abstract: Andy Moeller, Cleveland Browns offensive line coach, is suspended indefinitely for serious, undisclosed incident; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: Cleveland issued a statement during Monday’s practice saying that Andy Moeller “was involved in an incident involving allegations that we take very seriously.”

headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Pro Football; Browns Suspend a Line Coach

snippet: Cleveland issued a statement during Monday’s practice saying that Andy Moeller “was involved in an incident involving allegations that we take very seriously.”
